catalogue_description: Hebrew and Judaica Manuscripts at the Bodleian Libraries, Oxford University
title: Miscellany
author: Yiśraʾel ben Shmuel ha-Maʿaravi
description: Contents: David Kimhi, Commentary on the Psalms (ff. 6r-127v). Commentary on Abraham Ibn Ezra's commentary on the Pentateuch (ff. 128r-131v). Abraham ben Meïr Ibn Ezra, Commentary on Ecclesiastes (ff. 132r-153v). Yiśraʾel ben Shmuel ha-Maʿaravi, Hilkhot sheḥitah (ff. 153v-157v). Joseph ben Abraham ha-Kohen ha-Ro'eh al-Baṣīr, Maḥkhimat peti (ff. 157v-171v). Aaron ben Elijah, Gan Eden (Hilkhot sheḥitah) (ff. 172r-209r). Hilkhot sheḥitah (ff. 209v-210r). Hilkhot sheḥitah (ff. 210v-211v).
